name: SiteGPT
description: SiteGPT is an AI platform that enables users to create custom chatbots trained on their website's content for personalized customer support and engagement.
longDescription: SiteGPT is an AI-driven tool designed to help businesses and individuals build intelligent chatbots that are specifically trained on the content of their own websites. Its mission is to enhance customer interactions by providing accurate, context-aware responses based on the site's data, thereby reducing support tickets and improving user satisfaction. The platform works by crawling and indexing website pages, then using AI to generate a chatbot that can answer queries in real-time. This solves problems like information overload and inefficient customer service by automating responses with high relevance. Users can integrate these chatbots seamlessly into their sites, making it easier to handle FAQs, product inquiries, and more. Overall, SiteGPT empowers non-technical users to leverage AI for better online engagement without needing extensive coding knowledge.
features: Website Crawling: Automatically scans and indexes your website's content to train the AI chatbot on relevant data, ensuring accurate and up-to-date responses.
Custom Chatbot Creation: Allows users to build personalized chatbots tailored to their site's specific content, enhancing customer support efficiency.
Real-Time Query Handling: Enables the chatbot to provide instant, context-aware answers to user questions based on trained data, reducing response times.
Easy Integration: Offers simple embedding options for adding the chatbot to any website, with customizable appearance and behavior to match brand aesthetics.
Multi-Language Support: Supports training and responses in multiple languages, making it suitable for global audiences and international websites.
Analytics Dashboard: Provides insights into chatbot interactions, user queries, and performance metrics to help optimize and improve the AI's effectiveness.
Lead Generation Tools: Captures user information during conversations, helping businesses generate leads and nurture potential customers.
Security Features: Ensures data privacy with secure crawling and compliance with standards like GDPR, protecting sensitive information.
No-Code Interface: Features a user-friendly dashboard that requires no programming skills to set up and manage chatbots.
Scalable Pricing: Offers tiered plans to accommodate different usage levels, from small sites to enterprise-scale deployments.

faqs.question: What is SiteGPT?
faqs.answer: SiteGPT is an AI platform that lets you create custom chatbots trained on your website's content. It crawls your site to build a knowledgeable AI assistant for better customer interactions.

faqs.question: How does SiteGPT train the chatbot?
faqs.answer: SiteGPT crawls your website, indexes the content, and uses AI models to train the chatbot. This ensures responses are based directly on your site's information.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, SiteGPT offers a 7-day free trial to test its features. After the trial, users need to subscribe to a paid plan for continued access.

faqs.question: Can I integrate SiteGPT with my existing website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, SiteGPT provides easy integration via embed codes or plugins. It works with most website builders like WordPress, Shopify, and custom sites.

faqs.question: What kind of support does SiteGPT offer?
faqs.answer: SiteGPT provides email and chat support for all users. Premium plans include priority support and dedicated assistance for setup.

faqs.question: Is SiteGPT secure for handling user data?
faqs.answer: Yes, SiteGPT adheres to data security standards like GDPR and uses encryption. It only processes the data you authorize during crawling.

faqs.question: Can the chatbot handle multiple languages?
faqs.answer: SiteGPT supports multi-language training and responses. You can configure it for languages present in your website's content.

faqs.question: How much does SiteGPT cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing starts at around $49 per month for basic plans, with higher tiers for more features and usage. Check the website for current details.

faqs.question: What if my website has dynamic content?
faqs.answer: SiteGPT can recrawl your site periodically to update the chatbot with new content. This keeps responses accurate for dynamic sites.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use SiteGPT?
faqs.answer: No, SiteGPT's no-code interface makes it accessible for non-technical users. Setup involves simple steps like entering your URL and customizing options.
